import React, { Component } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; export default class Profile extends Component { state = { myProfile: { }, }; componentWillMount() { this.jwtHandler(); } jwtHandler = async () => { await axios({ url: "http://commerchant.herokuapp.com/accounts/profile", method: "GET", headers: { Authorization: window.localStorage.getItem("token"), }, }) .then((response) => this.setState({ myProfile: response.data.payload.account }) ) .catch(() => console.log("Profil g√∂sterilemedi")); console.log(this.state.myProfile) }; render() { return (
